sentences.sContent: You can train people to be more expressive.
sentences.sCn: 你可以培训人们使其更富于表现力。

sentences.sContent: ...the present fashion for intuitive, expressive painting.
sentences.sCn: …当前凭直觉的、富于表现力的绘画风尚。

words.tran: 表现地；意味深长地；表示地
快车，快递，专使；捷运公司
表达，表示；表情；表现力；措辞

trans.tranCn: 表现的；有表现力的；表达…的
trans.tranOther: If you describe a person or their behaviour as expressive, you mean that their behaviour clearly indicates their feelings or intentions
